name: Baked Chicken
imageAlt: Red baked chicken made with several Indian spices
description: Chicken baked with red chili powder, garam masala, turmeric, coriander powder, salt, and a hint of lemon juice
instructions: Wash the chicken and drain the water.
Add chili powder, garam masala, turmeric, coriander powder, salt, and lemon juice to a bowl.
Apply the chili paste to the chicken in a new bowl and make sure all pieces are covered well.
Take out a baking pan and apply oil to the surface.
Take the chicken pieces and place them on the baking pan.
Place the pan in the oven at 325 degrees Fahrenheit and heat for 1 - 2 hours. Take out from the oven every 15 minutes to see progress until chili paste has fully covered the chicken pieces.

name: Chicken Pita Wraps
imageAlt: Burrito with chicken, vegetables, and mayonnaise
description: Pita wrap made with chicken, onions, bell peppers, tomatoes, lettuce, and mayonnaise
instructions: Prepare some mayonnaise, either store-bought or a custom recipe.
Cut the chicken into small pieces that can be placed inside the wrap.
Add chili paste to the chicken and mix thoroughly
Heat the chicken and chili paste in a pot for 10 - 15 minutes. Keep the lid closed.
When the water is drained, feel free to lift the lid.
Heat some cheese with chili flakes to your liking.
Lay the pita wrap flat and cover it in a thin layer of mayonnaise. Place the chicken, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and cheese in the wrap as well.
Heat in the microwave for 1-2 minutes.
